title: ['Asphalt sealing', 'Pierce Stocking Scenic Drive Winter & Spring Road Closure']
description: ['A rolling closure of Lakeshore parking lots and roads will occur the week of April 15, 2024. Cracks and holes in the asphalt will be sealed ahead of a larger paving project beginning in May.', 'The scenic drive is closed. It is open to foot traffic until it reopens to vehicles. The drive opens to vehicles a few weeks after all threat of snow and ice have passed, usually late April or early May.']

title: ['Main Road Status']
description: ['The main park road is fully open to Rainbow Point (Mile 18 of 18). All park roads are currently open for the season. During snowstorms the road may temporarily close at Mile 3 for snowplow operations.']

title: ['Seasonal Road Closures']
description: ['The Wheeler Peak Scenic Drive is closed for the season at mile three at the Upper Lehman Campground. Snake Creek Road remains closed at the park boundary.']

title: ['CENTRAL VA – PARKING LOT CLOSURE– ROUTE 311/MCAFEE KNOB']
description: ['McAfee Knob/Route 311 parking area along the A.T. in Catawba will be closed Thursday, November 30. The lot is being closed to allow for the construction of a new pedestrian footbridge over Route 311.']

title: ['Paradise Road Status on 04/29/2024: Road Open', 'All vehicles are required to carry tire chains Nov 1 - May 1 when traveling in the park.']
description: ['The gate to Paradise at Longmire is open and will close overnight. The uphill gate at Longmire will close at 4pm. The downhill gate at Longmire will close at 5pm. All vehicles, including 4WD and AWD, are required to carry tire chains Nov 1 - May 1', 'All vehicles, including 4WD and AWD vehicles, must carry tire chains in the park during the winter season (November 1 - May 1) and be prepared to use them when tire chain requirements are posted.']

title: ['The Use of GPS is NOT Recommended', 'Bandelier Shuttle Service Done For the Season']
description: ['Numerous visitors have been routed to remote trailheads and out-of-the-way roads trying to use GPS to reach the main park area or shuttle stop.', 'The mandatory shuttle to Bandelier has ended for the 2023 season. Visitors may drive their private vehicles directly to the Bandelier Visitor Center. To avoid parking issues, arrive earlier in the day or later in the afternoon. The park is open until dusk']

title: ['Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Closure along George Washington Memorial Parkway', 'Some facilities closed along the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail']
description: ['There is a temporary closure of the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail crossing underneath Glebe Road Bridge due to construction along the George Washington Memorial Parkway. This work is a subsect of the North Parkway rehabilitation.', 'Please see our partner sites to find the most up-to-date information on closures, re-routes, or conditions along the Trail.']

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island closed to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island at Colonial National Historical Park will be closed fully to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18 to protect turtles during periods of increased activity and conduct a turtle activity study.']

title: ['Service Road Closure']
description: ['The Service Road/Trail from the Lighthouse parking lot toward the lighthouse and the road between the fort and visitor center hills are closed to due scheduled construction of the roadway. Please do not enter the area.']

title: ["Montezuma Castle and Montezuma Well Closed To RV's/Trailers"]
description: ["Due to high levels of visitation expected and limited parking; from 10am-2pm parking for oversized vehicles will not be permitted. This means RV's, trailers, buses, or any vehicle that takes up more than one parking space. Drop off at flagpole is allowed."]

title: ['Salmi Road Entrance to the Kab-Ash Trail out of the Kabetogama Community Remains Temporarily Closed.']
description: ["Salmi Road entrance to the Kab-Ash Trail remains temporarily closed at the trail's western most terminus. Access to the trail remains open at trailheads along Ash River Trail road, Meadwood Road, and the eastern terminus within the community of Ash River."]

title: ['Walnut Canyon Desert Drive Closed Due to Flood Damage']
description: ['Recent flooding has caused major damage to the road. It is unknown when repairs will begin or the length of time to complete. The main park road to the visitor center and cavern is open. For updates on the road and trails, click "More" below.']

title: ['Drive Cautiously - Endangered Birds on Roadway']
description: ['Nēnē (Hawaiian geese) and ʻuaʻu (Hawaiian petrel) are nesting in the park and may land on or frequent park roads, parking lots, and road leading up to the park. Drivers are reminded to drive at the posted speed limits and exercise caution.']

title: ['Watch Out for Tortoises on the Road']
description: ['Desert tortoises are active in the spring and will sometimes cross the road. Please drive cautiously and obey the speed limit. To learn more about this iconic species, why they are threatened today, and what to do if you see one, click the link below.']

title: ['Seasonal closure of certain areas to prevent poaching']
description: ['The floodplain forest between the Connecticut River and NH Route 12A, north of the Blow-Me-Down Brook and forested areas on either side of Saint-Gaudens Road are closed to prevent damage from fiddlehead poaching during the months of April and May.']

title: ['Vehicle Length Limits']
description: ["Vehicles longer than 24 feet are not permitted past the visitor center on Bonita Canyon Drive. Vehicles up to 29 feet are still allowed to stay in the campground, but can't go further. Parking for large vehicles and trailers is available at Faraway Ranch."]

title: ['Volcano Road Closure May 8 May 15 or 16', 'Volcano Road Closed to RVs and Buses over 26 feet, and to all Trailers.']
description: ['Volcano Road will have short closures for construction May 8 and May 15 or 16. The Visitor Center, Park Film, Museum, Boca and Lava Flow trails, and Bookstore will all be open.', 'The Volcano top road is not accessible to RVs, buses, attached trailers, or any other vehicle over 26 feet in length, due to the narrowness and weight limits of Volcano Road. Trailer drop off and RV/bus parking is available at the Visitor Center.']

title: ['High Visitation during the months of March, April, and May', 'Vehicle Break-Ins']
description: ['Spring is upon us, we expect high visitation at Saguaro National Park during March, April, & May. There is limited parking at the Rincon Mountain Visitor Center (east side). Large vehicles may find difficulty parking on the east side. Call for more info.', "Saguaro National Park is an urban park. Vehicle break-ins have occurred at trailheads around the park. Don't make yourself a target. Leave valuables at home, secure your vehicle, and report any suspicious activity."]

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island closed to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island at Colonial National Historical Park will be closed fully to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18 to protect turtles during periods of increased activity and conduct a turtle activity study.']

title: ['Bringing a Pet to Big Bend?']
description: ['Bringing your pet to Big Bend National Park will limit some of your park explorations and opportunities. Pets are not allowed on park trails, in the backcountry, or on the river. Pets are allowed only where vehicles can go. Pets may not be left unattended']

title: ['Dangerous Highway Crossing']
description: ['Highway 177 is 60 mph with a blind spot directly across from the house. Safely use the highway underpass to the Fox Creek Trail just south of the visitor center parking lot. Be smart, stay alive.']

Park Full Name: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site
title: ['Pedestrian Bridge at Front Lake is Closed']
description: ['The pedestrian bridge at the main entrance to the park is closed. A 6-passenger accessible shuttle runs daily every 20 minutes from 9:40 am to 4:20 pm, from the main parking lot, on Little River Road, to the Sandburg Home and farm area.']

title: ['Atrisco Vista Boulevard and Volcanoes Day Use Area Closed May 3rd', 'Vehicle Break-Ins: Take precautions to secure your vehicle and valuables.']
description: ['USA Cycling Colligate Road National Competitions will make Atrisco Visa Boulevard and Volcanoes Day Use Area inaccessible for most of May 3rd. Access to Volcanoes Day Use Area will be available from 12 pm to 12:30 pm and after 2:30 from Paseo del Norte.', "This is an urban park. Don't hide valuables inside your car. Carry items with you on hike. Lock your vehicle and set car alarm. Recent auto break-ins at Rinconada Canyon parking lot. Report suspicious persons loitering/peeking in cars. Call 928-638-7805"]

title: ['Spring Conditions']
description: ['Spring weather is variable at Mesa Verde. Snow and ice can delay opening the main park road. Trails often become muddy or closed due to rain or late snow melt. Current info is available at the Visitor and Resource Center. Click the link below for update']

title: ['State Route 148 closed for the winter season']
description: ['Visitors can access the park via Highway 143 and the town of Brian Head. You can view Cedar Breaks from the Northview Overlook. State Route 143 will remain open, weather permitting. On April 22, the seasonal snowmobile trail will close.']

title: ['Winter Seasonal Road Closures']
description: ['Portions of the Teton Park Road (Taggart Lake TH to Signal Mt.), Moose-Wilson Road (Granite Canyon TH to Death Canyon Road), and other roads are closed to vehicles. Check the Grand Teton Roads page for the latest seasonal and weather related closures.']

title: ['Portions of Braddock Road Trail Closed']
description: ['Portions of the Braddock Road Trail at the Indian Run bridge are closed until a new foot bridge is constructed.']

title: ['Trail Closure']
description: ['Wilderness Road is closed from Tennessee Road Trail to the trail that leads up to Gap Cave for scheduled maintenance work.']

title: ['Warning about GPS Systems!']
description: ['Vehicle Navigation Systems and GPS units may provide inaccurate information—sending drivers the wrong way on one-way roads, leading them to dead ends in remote areas, or sending them on roads which are impassable. Use the Interstate exits for wayfinding.']

title: ['Passenger Ferry Dock Closed']
description: ['The ferry dock servicing the Cape Lookout Lighthouse area is closed for repairs. Visitors will have to use an alternative route on the beach to access the boardwalk. Visitors should wear sturdy, closed toe shoes because of potential hazards.']

title: ['Going-to-the-Sun Road Seasonal Closure']
description: ['The alpine section of the Going-to-the-Sun Road is closed for the season. Specific closure locations are dependent on plowing progress.']

title: ['Louisiana Circle Closed', "North Union Avenue and Grant's Circle Closed"]
description: ['Louisiana Circle is closed to vehicles and pedestrians due to slope instability. Navy Circle is open and also provides views of the Mississippi River.', "Due to weather related incidents, North Union Avenue and Grant's Circle are closed to vehicular and recreational traffic. Entering these areas is prohibited. A portion of Grant Avenue is open for touring."]

title: ['Use Caution with GPS Navigation']
description: ['The new visitor center is located at 17970 US Hwy 30, about one mile north of downtown Hagerman and the old visitor center. Highway signs and GPS navigation may not yet be up-to-date.']

title: ['Road Closure at Amistad Acres']
description: ['Due to soil and vegetation damage caused by off-road vehicle travel near Amistad Acres, undesignated dirt loop roads in the area are closed to vehicle traffic until further notice. The area will remain open to foot traffic.']

title: ['Hart Mine Road CLOSED due to collapsed culverts', 'Most Monument Roads Require Heavy Duty 4WD Vehicle to Travel Safely', 'Use Caution on Roads with Debris']
description: ['Do not drive on Hart Mine Road. Missing culverts are hazardous for all vehicles and road is subject to sudden collapse. Please do not drive around signed barricades.', 'Breaking down in the remote monument can be a life-threatening emergency. Most roads require a well-equipped, heavy-duty 4WD vehicle to travel. 2WD high clearance vehicles must use Walking Box Ranch Rd for entry and exit. No Visitor Facilities Available.', 'Flooding has resulted in debris along many roads within the park boundaries. Please use caution when driving on paved roads and watch for road crews at work. Be aware that unimproved and dirt roads may be impassible due to washouts, so plan accordingly.']

title: ['Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['You can prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots and scenic overlooks. Before leaving your car for even a short period of time: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Trail Ridge Road is Closed to Through Travel for the Winter Season']
description: ['Trail Ridge Road, which is Hwy 34 through RMNP, is closed to through travel for the winter. The road is closed at Many Parks Curve on the east side of the park and at the Colorado River Trailhead on the west side. For more information, call 970-586-1222.']

Park Full Name: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument
title: ['Painted Hills- Large RV or Travel Trailer not Recommended Beyond Overlook Trail']
description: ['Don’t get your vehicle stuck at the Painted Hills! We want you and your RV or large bus to enjoy your trip. Travel trailers or large buses are not recommended beyond the Overlook Trail at Painted Hills due to limited turning radius.']

title: ['Notice to travelers to National Cemetery']
description: ['Due to the narrow roadway & tight turn, RVs, mobile homes, charter buses, delivery trucks, or vehicles with trailers are prohibited from the crest of Monument Hill. Check for information about parking at the Visitor Center upon your arrival.']

Park Full Name: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area
title: ['Old Mine Road South Closed for Rehabilitation Project']
description: ['Old Mine Road between Millbrook Village and Worthington State Forest will be closed for the 2024 summer season for a pavement rehabilitation project. Please see news releases for more information.']

title: ['Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park', 'Parking & Shuttle Reservations Always Required - See "Know Before You Go" for Details']
description: ['You can prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots and scenic overlooks. Before leaving your car for even a short period of time: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.', 'Reservations are required for all personal vehicles and shuttle riders at Muir Woods. You can make your reservation by visiting www.gomuirwoods.com. Visit our "Know Before You Go" webpage to learn more important details before your visit.']

title: ['Select Trails Require Day Use Pass from Woodstock Inn & Resort Nordic Center']
description: ['Four miles of trail along the carriage road corridors have been designated as ‘Multi-Use Trails’ in winter – walkers are permitted to use these trails free of charge. All other trails require a day/season pass from the Woodstock Inn. See link for details.']

title: ['Green River Ferry Status']
description: ['The Green River Ferry Status can change without advanced warning. For the most up-to-date ferry status information please call the Green River Ferry Hotline at (270) 758-2166 or follow the Mammoth Cave Roads and Ferry Twitter feed. 2 vehicle limit.']

title: ['Wayside Installation']
description: ['Work is currently taking place around the tour road installing new signage. Closures are not expected at this time, but please use caution and follow instructions from contractors or staff.']

Park Full Name: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park
title: ['Heavy Construction Vehicle Operations & Limited Amphitheater Accessibility']
description: ['Heavy construction vehicles are operating through the parking lot & Lower Overlook Park - use caution & be vigilant for hazards. Lower Overlook & Amphitheater access is via stairs only for construction duration.']

title: ['Trail Closures on Battle Road Trail']
description: ['Battle Road Trail between Olive Stow Boardwalk to Shadyside Avenue and Lexington Road is closed until late Spring 2024. This will allow for the completion of a trail re-route. Entering closures is prohibited. Please plan accordingly.']

Park Full Name: Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site
title: ['GPS Navigation Systems']
description: ["GPS navigation systems often misdirect visitors driving to Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site. GPS systems often route visitors to our back gate, or to the entrance for Grant's Farm (not affiliated with the NPS). Please visit our directions page."]

title: ['Hilina Pali Road and Overnight Backcountry Closures In Effect Due to Elevated Seismicity']
description: ['Due to a sharp increase in earthquakes below the Upper East Rift Zone and Kīlauea summit, Hilina Pali Road is closed from Chain of Craters Road. Overnight use of the coastal backcountry, Nāpau and Pepeiao Cabin is temporarily closed.']

title: ['Resurfacing Rim Rock Drive']
description: ['Project work runs from 4/2- 8/5. There will be delays of up to 15 minutes and occasional road closures between DS Rd and Independence Monument View. Visit the project page for a full work schedule.']

title: ['East Parking Lot Restoration']
description: ['Restoration of the parking lot East side of Route 345 (off Hopewell Rd) is anticipated to start this week.\xa0 No parking North of Hopewell Rd and slight trail & bridge diversions will be necessary during the project, anticipated to be completed Spring 2024.']

title: ['Trail Conditions']
description: ['Trail conditions can vary throughout the state. Before heading out, check the trail conditions, potential re-routes and closures on the Ice Age Trail Alliance website.']

title: ['County Line Road Closed Monday To Friday']
description: ['County Line Road is closed during the week, from Monday through Friday. The closure will apply to all vehicular, pedestrian, and bicycle traffic. Please find an alternate route.']

Park Full Name: Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument
title: ['Swift Brook Road Gates Closed for Mud Season', 'North Entrance and Loop Roads Closed for the Winter Season']
description: ['As of March 4, 2024, the gates on Swift Brook Road that are managed by Prentiss & Carlisle have been closed and locked. These privately owned roads are closed to vehicle traffic every spring during "mud season" to prevent road damage.', 'As of November 3, 2023, the North Entrance Road and the Katahdin View Loop Road are closed to wheeled vehicles for the winter season. Access by foot and bicycle is permitted.']

title: ['Phleger Estate Miramontes Trail Closed for Public Safety January 2022 Until Trail is Replaced', 'Smith Road Trailhead Parking Lot Temporary Partial Closure April 8 - June 30, 2024', 'Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['Due to previous storm damage, the trail has been closed until the park can re-route it to a better location. Until construction of a re-route is complete, the trail will be closed.', 'Northwest portion of the parking lot off of Bunker Road in Marin Headlands will be temporarily closed. Stay out of the closure and park in the other parking spaces.', 'You can prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots and scenic overlooks. Before leaving your car for even a short period of time: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Apostle Islands National Lakeshore Ice Caves Are Closed']
description: ['Due to unstable ice conditions, an ongoing closure remains in effect for ice caves within the boundaries of the park. This includes ice cave areas accessed from Meyers Beach Road. The last time stable ice allowed access to the ice caves was 2015.']

title: ['Landing at Hwy 137']
description: ['The highway 137 bridge landing sustained flood damage in 2019 and the landing restoration by NDOT has been completed. The area is smaller than in the past and the access to the water is steeper. Use caution when accessing the landing']

title: ['Click on "caution" alerts below for important details on accessing the park', "Road construction on approach to park's Homestead entrance", 'Roadwork may cause delays on US 41/Tamiami Trail']
description: ['Roads to the park have delays from construction and Shark Valley parking lot is regularly filling to capacity from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m. with wait times of up to 2 hours.', 'Roadwork is underway along State Road 9336 leading to the Homestead entrance of the park, approaching the Ernest F. Coe Visitor Center. Drivers may experience short delays and should watch for personnel, construction equipment, and slowdowns.', "Current roadwork is ongoing along the park's northern boundary on US Highway 41/Tamiami Trail to raise the road for Everglades Restoration benefits. Drivers may experience up to 15-minute delays and should watch for personnel, equipment and slow downs."]

title: ['Road Construction Delays April 1 to Mid-August 2024']
description: ['Road construction in the park from April 1 to mid-August 2024. Weekly updates on construction activities and locations in the park will be posted on the Bighorn Canyon Facebook page. Visitors can also call 307-548-5406 for current conditions.']

title: ['Road Closure: Marshall Hall Access Road']
description: ['The Marshall Hall Access Road is closed due to construction. This road connects the Marshall Hall ruins to Marshall Hall Rd. The main road remains open.']

title: ['Secure trash and food']
description: ['Pack it in, pack it out! There are no trash services in or around the monument. All food & trash must be secured inside a vehicle or hard sided containers. Ravens routinely open zipped bags & tear into trash bags left outside or in the bed of a truck.']

Park Full Name: Sand Creek Massacre National Historic Site
title: ['8 Miles of Unpaved Road to Reach Park']
description: ['In order to reach the Sand Creek Massacre NHS, you must travel on at least 8 miles of unpaved roads. We are not able to guarantee road conditions of county roads 54 or W after spring storms.']

title: ['Road Construction Closures']
description: ['Fritch Fortress is closed to the visiting public due to road construction. There is no public access.']

title: ['Route 7 from Sawmill, AZ is NOT recommended']
description: ['Entering the park from the east at Sawmill, AZ on Route 7 is not recommended. Part of this route is UNPAVED and UNMAINTAINED. Please stay on paved roads, such as Indian Route 64 from Tsaile, AZ and Highway 191/Route 7 from Chinle, AZ.']

title: ['Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['You can prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots and scenic overlooks. Before leaving your car for even a short period of time: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Navigation']
description: ['Do not rely on GPS digital navigation systems to find your way to Badlands National Park. Please note that the Visitor Center at 25216 Ben Reifel Road, Interior SD 57750 is located just off I-90.']

title: ['Multiple road projects underway', 'Closures Due to Weather']
description: ['Road status information with links to project information is updated daily.', 'Temporary winter weather-related closures may be in effect along the parkway. Please check the road and facility closure page for updates to the road status.']

title: ['Reds Meadow Road Access Restrictions in 2024', 'Devils Postpile National Monument is closed']
description: ['Reds Meadow Road and shuttle service, which provide access to Devils Postpile National Monument, will be closed 24 hours per day for construction work from Sundays at 11 pm through Fridays at 9 am (excluding holidays) during the summer 2024 season.', 'Devils Postpile National Monument and Reds Meadow Road are closed for season; they will not reopen before June 2024.']

title: ['Exit Glacier Developed Area OPEN to Snowmachine use for 2023/24 season', 'Road to Exit Glacier CLOSED to automobiles for the winter']
description: ['Kenai Fjords National Park opened the Exit Glacier Developed Area to off road snowmachine use on Monday, December 18, 2023.', 'The road to Exit Glacier is now closed to automobile access at mile 1.3 of the Herman Leirer Road for the summer season.']

Park Full Name: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area
title: ['Franklin Canyon Park is Closed until further notice.']
description: ['Franklin Canyon Park is CLOSED until further notice at both entrances. Park is CLOSED to all vehicles and pedestrians at both entrances due to hazardous conditions.']

title: ['Hawk Creek Lane Restriction at Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area']
description: ['Due to undercutting action of Hawk Creek on the access road between the Hawk Creek campground and boat launch, the road will be reduced to one lane until further notice. Use caution while on this road.']

title: ['Marconi Stairs/Beach Closed 4/30-5/23', 'Pilgrim Heights Parking Area and Access Closed 3/11-5/18']
description: ["The Marconi Beach stairs will be demo'ed and replaced between 4/30-5/23 and will reopen for Memorial Day weekend. For public safety and to allow the contractor to work unimpeded, the entrance road and parking area will be closed for the duration.", 'Between 3/11-5/18, the Pilgrim Heights parking area and access roadways in Truro will be temporarily closed to allow for repaving and survey work. 24-hour vehicle and pedestrian closures will be in place during this time.']

title: ['Scenic Drive Rehabilitation Project', 'Seasonal Canyon Closures']
description: ['Effective April 29, 2024 the Scenic Drive will close from just south of the Grand Wash Road to Capitol Gorge. Starting May 13, the Scenic Drive south of the campground will close. Expect heavy truck traffic. Most of the park remains accessible.', 'The following are closed to the public through 8/31/2024 to protect sensitive resources: the heads of Burro Wash & Fivemile Wash continuing east 2 miles, Shinob Canyon and any route descending into Shinob, including Na-gah, Nighthawk, & Timpie.']

title: ['NPS 300 Road Conditions', 'El Malpais Visitor Center closed May 13-15']
description: ['NPS 300 to Big Tubes is dry with\xa0some two-foot-deep ruts. A four-wheel-drive, high clearance vehicle is required.', "The El Malpais Visitor Center will be closed on Monday, May 13, through Wednesday, May 15, 2024, for seasonal staff training. The park's roads and hiking trails are all open to visit while the visitor center is closed. Thank you for your understanding."]

title: ['Buxton Beach Access & Adjacent Beach Temporarily Closed']
description: ['The Buxton Beach Access, located at the end of Old Lighthouse Road in Buxton, and an adjacent three-tenths of a mile long stretch of beach, are temporarily closed due to petroleum contamination and remnant military infrastructure.']

title: ['Cascade River Road Closed for the Winter Season', 'Be Aware of Break-ins along State Route 20']
description: ['Cascade River Road is closed for the winter season at milepost 20 (El Dorado parking lot), three miles before the trailhead.', 'Prevent smashed windows and theft. Break-ins are not uncommon at trailheads along State Route 20. Remove your valuables and electronics and take associated electronic cords.']

title: ['Santa Rosa/Highway 399 Parking Lot Closure']
description: ['The Santa Rosa Parking lots along Highway 399, numbers 32A and 33A and currently closed to the public for resurfacing and restriping.']

Park Full Name: Craters of the Moon National Monument and Preserve
title: ['Loop Road Closed to Foot and Wheeled Traffic Beyond Devils Orchard April 22 to April 29', 'Campground Closed for the Season', 'Navigation']
description: ['The Loop Road is open to vehicles as far as Devils Orchard. The Loop Road and all trails beyond Devils Orchard are closed to all foot and wheeled traffic while road maintenance takes place.', 'Lava Flow Campground closed to all for safety reasons while road maintenance takes place. Opening date pending road maintenance completion. Check back on Monday April 29.', 'Please do not rely upon GPS digital navigation systems to find your way to Craters of the Moon. Please note that the Visitor Center at 1266 Craters Loop Road is located just off U.S. Highway 20/26/93 and is not accessed via any unpaved roads.']

title: ['Select Roads Open to Regular Vehicles', 'Vehicle Entrance Reservation Not Needed']
description: ['West Entrance to Old Faithful, Mammoth Hot Springs to Old Faithful, and Norris Junction to Canyon Village are open for the summer season. Additional park roads will open throughout May, weather permitting.', 'Although an entrance pass is required to enter Yellowstone National Park, vehicle reservations are not needed. You are encouraged to purchase an entrance pass before arriving, but you may also purchase passes at any entrance station upon arrival.']

title: ['Road repairs may occur 5/29 - 8/7; brief delays possible', 'Seasonal climbing closures in effect', 'Expect long lines to enter the park']
description: ["Crews will perform crack sealing and similar minor repairs on Canyonlands' paved park road this summer. Visitors may encounter brief delays or reduced availability in some parking lots.", 'All climbers should ensure routes are not subject to wildlife seasonal closures. Many closures start March 1, March 15, or April 1 and continue through spring and summer.', 'Between March and November, particularly on busy holiday weekends, you may experience long lines at the entrance road. Parking lots at popular trailheads and viewpoints will fill early. Pack your patience and arrive early to avoid crowds.']

title: ['Upcoming Closure', 'Road Open to: Mile 30 (Teklanika River)', 'Park Operations Altered Due to Pretty Rocks Landslide']
description: ['Beginning on May 6, through May 12 at the latest, the Park Road and all backcountry units west of the Teklanika River bridge (Mile 31) will be closed for bear collaring operations. The closure applies to all pedestrians, bicyclists, and backcountry users.', 'The Denali Park Road is currently open to Mile 30, Teklanika River. If wintry conditions occur, the road may close at some point closer to the park entrance.', 'Summer access to facilities and services in Denali remains altered due to the Pretty Rocks Landslide and the associated closure of the Park Road at Mile 43. Check here for more information on what to expect.']

title: ['Roosevelt Campobello International Park is located in Welshpool.']
description: ['Campobello Island is located in the province of New Brunswick, Canada. The physical address for the Visitor Centre is: 459 Route 774 Welshpool, New Brunswick, Canada E5E 1A4']

Park Full Name: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine
title: ['Motorized Recreational Scooters Not Permitted in Park']
description: ['For the safety and protection of visitors and park resources, motorized scooters are not permitted within the park. Any vehicles (scooters, bicycles, etc.) that are part of a ride-share program may not be left behind for pick up inside the park']

title: ['South Cut trail Partially Closed']
description: ['South Cut Trail is closed between the main road and Killman Field trail due to washout along the trail. Detour for that section is along Killman Field trail. South Cut trail from Killman Field trail to the beach is open.']

title: ['RVs, Trailers and Other Oversized Vehicles (Limited Parking)']
description: ['Due to increased visitation, parking lots often fill up early. Visitors need to be aware that parking for larger vehicles is very limited. RVs using "tow dollies" may have to unhook towed vehicles in order to turn around in the parking lot on busy days.']

title: ['South Unit Road from the Old East Entrance station mile near marker 22 to mile marker 28']
description: ['Due to major road repair work, the former scenic loop between the Old East Entrance Station (near mile marker 22) and mile marker 28 is closed to all traffic, including pedestrian, and bicycle access.']

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.']

title: ['Morristown road closures beginning 29 February', 'Passaic River Trail Bridge washed out']
description: ['On 2/29 Eastbound Morris St. will be closed down to one lane starting at Ridgedale Ave for about 140 days. Westbound Morris St will closed to all traffic starting at the intersection of Ford Ave and Taft Lane. Please plan alternate routes.', "Tropical Storm Ida washed out the Passaic River bridge on the Patriot's Path Trail south of Tempe Wick Road. This area is a known habitat of the endangered wood turtle, so do not wade, walk, or let your dog run in the river at this location."]

title: ['Slant Rock Road Closed to Vehicular Traffic']
description: ['Due to washout and bad road conditions Slant Rock Road has been closed to all traffic aside from hikers and bikers. To access Slant Rock, park your vehicle at the hunting inspection station off of Road 103.']

title: ["What's Closed and What's Open? (Park Operational Updates) Monday, April 29, 2024"]
description: ['The Visitor Center is CLOSED between April 21 and May 4 for staff training. Visit the link for available visitor services/hours of operation. The North Rim of the park and SR 67 remain CLOSED to all vehicle traffic until May 15.']

title: ['Portion of Calumet Trail Closed', 'Poor Trail Conditions on the Calumet Bike Trail']
description: ['The Calumet Trail from Mineral Springs Road to SR 49 is closed April 15th through the middle of June. There will be no public access through this stretch during this time. The closure is needed to modernize the trail by raising it and paving it.', 'The section of trail from the Dune Park Train Station to East State Park Road is in very poor condition with large, deep puddles of standing water and sections with larger gravel stones. Ride this section with extreme caution.']

title: ['Occasional lane closures and traffic delays due to construction at Hwy ZZ & Farm Rd 182']
description: ["Please be advised of potential delays or route obstructions to the Wilson's Creek National Battlefield Entrance from Hwy ZZ starting Monday, September 18th. Entering Wilson's Creek National Battlefield from Farm Road 182 via Battlefield may be faster."]

title: ['Potomac Heritage National Trail Closed at Glebe Road for construction activities']
description: ['The National Park Service is imposing a temporary closure of a portion of the Potomac Heritage National Trail crossing underneath Glebe Road Bridge during construction activities. This work is a subsect of the North Parkway rehabilitation.']

Park Full Name: Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site
title: ['A Short Walk is Required to Reach the Fort']
description: ["A 1/4 mile (1,275 feet) walk on a paved trail from the parking area is required to reach the gate of the fort. At the end of your visit, you'll return to your vehicle along the same path."]

title: ['Lassen National Park Highway is CLOSED for the season', 'Changing conditions']
description: ['Lassen National Park Highway connecting the north and south park entrances is CLOSED to vehicles. Vehicles can still access two park entrances. One at the northwest and the other at the southwest entrances throughout the snow season. Learn more.', 'Inclement weather may cause unexpected delays, closures and possibly hazardous road conditions. The visitor center phone line may be unavailable.']

title: ['US 50 Emergency Closure', 'U.S. Highway 50 Roadwork (On hold until Spring 2024)']
description: ['Colorado Department of Transportation has closed US 50 between County Road 26 and Elk Creek Road (18 to 20 miles west of Gunnison) from Mile Point 136 to Mile Point 140. Road closed expect delays due to road maintenance operations, no reopening date yet.', 'Road construction with delays and nightly closures on US Highway 50 between Cimarron and Pine Creek continues at least through Summer 2024. The road is open to two-way traffic on weekends and holidays. Cycling is not permitted through the project.']

title: ['Backcountry vehicle route closed for the season']
description: ['The full backcountry vehicle route remains closed for the winter season until May 15. Vehicle access is limited to the Cabin District.']

title: ['Road repairs may occur 4/29 to 8/1; brief delays possible', 'Seasonal climbing closures in effect']
description: ["Crews will perform crack sealing and similar minor repairs on Arches' paved park road this summer. Visitors may encounter brief delays or reduced availability in some parking lots.", 'All climbers should ensure routes are not subject to wildlife seasonal closures. Many closures start March 1 or April 1 and continue through spring and summer.']

title: ['Highway 244 Closed to Through Traffic']
description: ['Highway 244 will be closed to through traffic from 10/2/23 through no later than 5/3/24. Access to Mt. Rushmore will remain open via U.S. Highway 16A and Highway 244 from the east. A detour will be installed around the project along U.S.']

title: ['Bridge Replacement on Hopetown Rd. to Affect Access to Hopeton Earthworks']
description: ['Scheduled bridge replacement on Hopetown Road will impact visitor use at the Hopeton Earthworks parking lot. The parking lot will not be accessible to foot or vehicle traffic starting Sunday, May 5 thru at least May 11. Contact the park for more info.']

title: ['Arizona Off-Highway Vehicle (OHV) Requirements for Residents and Non-residents.', 'Looking for a Grand Canyon view? A warning about GPS navigation using mobile devices.']
description: ['Off-highway vehicles (OHVs) are required by law to display a valid OHV decal to operate on public and state trust lands in Arizona. This includes “street legal” vehicles that meet these two requirements.', 'GPS apps on mobile devices may direct visitors to "Grand Canyon-Parashant" who type "Grand Canyon" into their driving directions. Roads across Parashant require 4-wheel drive and all-terrain tires. There are no visitor services or cell reception here.']

title: ["Staircase to Little Hunter's Beach closed until further notice", 'Jordan Pond Road closed due to bridge repair project', 'Historic Carriage Roads open to pedestrians only']
description: ["Due to damage and unsafe conditions caused by recent storms, a staircase and access route from the Park Loop Road to Little Hunter's Beach is closed until further notice. Park staff are working to address issues there over coming weeks.", 'Jordan Pond Road is closed to through traffic as part of a bridge repair project. Stanley Brook Road will remain open to provide access the Jordan Pond area.', "Acadia's historic carriage roads are now open only to pedestrians. They remain closed to all other uses, such has cycling and horses, to protect them during spring thaw, also known as “mud season.” Watch for further updates as conditions allow."]

title: ['Main Park Roads Open to Vehicular Traffic Starting March 10', 'County road through the Fort Heiman Unit is Closed to Vehicles Past the Pavilion']
description: ['Beginning Sunday, March 10th, 2024, main park roads will be open to vehicular traffic from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.', 'Fort Heiman is located at 682 Fort Heiman Road, New Concord KY. Due to poor conditions of county roads, the County has posted the loop road closed to vehicles past the park pavilion. Pedestrian access is permitted.']

title: ['Gorge Road Closure for Paving']
description: ['Gorge Road, from the Gulpha Gorge Campground entrance to Sleepy Valley will be closed for paving starting Sun., April 28 at 8:00 p.m., weather permitting. This segment of the road will remain closed for at least a few days until paving operations finish.']

title: ['Road Damage']
description: ['Due to damage from heavy rains, some roads may require high clearance or 4x4 vehicles for passage. Please use caution when approaching and driving on roadways. Trailers over 30 ft not advised.']

title: ['Temporary Blackland Prairie Trail Closure to Equestrians']
description: ['Heavy rain has undermined a culvert making it unsafe for passage. Due to horse trailer parking availability, the entire section is closed to equestrians. Hikers are still able to travel from the railroad tracks to the Parkway Visitor Center.']

title: ['Hurricane Ridge Road Status 4/29/24']
description: ['Hurricane Ridge Road is currently open.']

title: ['Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['You can help prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots. Before leaving your car to catch the ferry: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Sections of Sunken Forest Boardwalk Inaccessible During Repair Work']
description: ['During the month of April, a section of boardwalk near Sailors Haven marina will be inaccessible due to repair work. Visitors walking the trail should use the west end trail entrances and walk an out-and-back route, as loop walks will not be possible.']

title: ['Highway 245 is Closed for Construction and Cannot Be Used to Reach or Leave the Grant Grove Area', 'Some Winter Seasonal Road Closures Remain In Effect']
description: ['Highway 245 outside the parks is under construction by CalTrans. It is scheduled to be closed through June 30, 2024. It is not possible to reach or leave the Grant Grove area using Highway 245. Alternate routes are available.', 'It is still winter in the mountains, and some roads remain under a seasonal closure. To see which roads are closed, click on the "more" link:']

title: ['If you have been redirected from the New Jersey Coastal Heritage Trail Route']
description: ["You were redirected to this site from the New Jersey Coastal Heritage Trail Route because of a sunset clause in the Trail's federal legislation, the NPS lost its legislative authority to manage the trail after 9-30-2011."]

Park Full Name: Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park
title: ['Hiking in Gold Mine Tract']
description: ['Visitors are restricted to the designated trails within the Gold Mine Tract in the Great Falls area. This location is generally defined as that area bordered by MacArthur Boulevard and Berma Road and depicted on the Great Falls Maryland Hiking Map.']

title: ['Park Closures', 'RV and Tractor Trailer Parking at the Visitor Center']
description: ['From time to time the missile range that surrounds the park performs military testing that may require the closure of the park or Highway 70. Please plan your visit around upcoming military tests.', 'There is limited space for parking for recreational vehicles and trailers in the parking lot directly in front (south) of the visitor center. RVs are asked to not park in the lot behind the visitor center. There is no parking space for tractor trailers.']

title: ['Road maintenance on Bald Hills (after Dolason trailhead).']
description: ['From April 15-June 2024, the Humboldt County Department of Public Works will be resurfacing Bald Hills Road from post mark 16.05 to 19.04. Expect delays greater than 15 minutes. For concerns or questions, contact Angi Sorensen at (707) 445-7448.']
relatedRoadEvents: [[{'title': 'Road maintenance on Bald Hills (after Dolason trailhead).', 'id': '714A6CE6-A089-4373-A5BB-0077816C36FE', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/redw/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}]]

Park Full Name: Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park
title: ['US HWY 50 CLOSURE ALERT - as of April 18, 2024', 'Winter Road Closures', 'Road Construction Update - Delays and Closures Start April 2024', 'Road Construction at Black Canyon South Rim - 2024 and 2025', 'Highway 50 Construction']
description: ['Colorado Department of Transportation has closed US Highway 50 near Dillon Pinnacles, between Black Canyon NP and Curecanti NRA (mile marker 136 to 138), for emergency maintenance on the bridge. Check https://www.cotrip.org/home for updates.', 'The North Rim Road is still closed to cars for the season beyond the gate at the northern park boundary. It is expected to open in early May 2024. The South Rim Drive beyond the visitor center and East Portal Road are open for the season.', 'Phase one of this major road improvement project starts April 1, 2024 with alternating one-way traffic (15-minute stops/delays) starting at the park entrance on Hwy 347. Tomichi Point parking lot and viewpoint will be closed for the month of April.', 'Major road improvement projects will impact the park from April-November 2024. Expect delays, alternating one-way traffic, and parking lot closures from the park boundary on Hwy 347 to the visitor center. Drive with extra caution. More road work in 2025.', 'Road construction and closures will continue in 2024. The project is located on US Highway 50 between mileposts 123 and 127, approx. 30 miles east of Montrose, Colorado. Refer to www.us50info.com for updated construction information.']

title: ['Camp only in campgrounds']
description: ['If you camp in a vehicle in an area that is not a designated campground, you may get a citation. Learn more about opportunities to camp in Zion.']

title: ['Asphalt sealing', 'Pierce Stocking Scenic Drive Winter & Spring Road Closure']
description: ['A rolling closure of Lakeshore parking lots and roads will occur the week of April 15, 2024. Cracks and holes in the asphalt will be sealed ahead of a larger paving project beginning in May.', 'The scenic drive is closed. It is open to foot traffic until it reopens to vehicles. The drive opens to vehicles a few weeks after all threat of snow and ice have passed, usually late April or early May.']

title: ['Heintooga Round Bottom and Heintooga Ridge roads are closed for the season', 'Most visitors need a parking tag', 'Trail Advisory']
description: ['The following roads are closed for the season: Heintooga Round Bottom and Heintooga Ridge. Both are scheduled to open May 10.', 'All vehicles parking for longer than 15 minutes require a parking tag. Three tag durations are available for purchase for all vehicle sizes and types: Daily ($5), Weekly ($15), or Annual ($40).', 'Several trails in the park are temporarily closed. Please check the "Trail and Backcountry Closures, Warnings & Cautions" section of the Current Road, Facility, Trail & Backcountry Updates page for further details.']

title: ['Rim Drive and North Entrance Road are CLOSED for the Season']
description: ['The roads will not reopen until sometime in June or July as plow operators are gradually able to clear sections of large quantities of snow. All other roads remain OPEN, *weather permitting.* Expect snowy and icy conditions. All Oregon chain laws apply.']

title: ['Red Gate Fire Road', 'Tanners Ridge Fire Road', "Jeremy's Run Trail from the boundary"]
description: ['Closed to vehicular traffic.', 'Closed to vehicular traffic.', "The boundary access to Jeremy's Run Trail across private property at State Route 611 is temporarily closed by the landowner. The park trail remains open. Hikers must access Jeremy's Run from Skyline Drive. The park is working to resolve the situation."]
relatedRoadEvents: [[{'title': 'Red Gate Fire Road', 'id': 'B7AF53DA-FA44-4743-B579-FF81CB68EE33', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/shen/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}], [{'title': 'Tanners Ridge Fire Road', 'id': 'C509E46A-FE91-4AE4-9D13-9ECFEFC2F89D', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/shen/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}], []]

title: ['Tioga Road, Glacier Point Road, and Mariposa Grove Road are closed for the winter']
description: ['Tioga Road (continuation of Highway 120 through the park) and Glacier Point Road are closed for the season due to snow. They usually open in late May or June. Call 209/372-0200 (then 1, 1) for road conditions and tire chain requirements.']

title: ['Williams Ranch Road Closed', "Devil's Hall is a Strenuous Hike"]
description: ['The Williams Ranch Road is currently impassable and closed to public access due to unsafe conditions.', "The hike to Devil's Hall is rated as strenuous. The portion of the route in the wash requires rock scrambling and is dangerous when wet or if water is present. The wash surface is loose gravel and rocks and may be unstable."]

title: ['West and East Border Roads closed for public safety', 'Gachado Line Camp open. Southeast border road and access roads closed', 'Pozo Nuevo Road to Bates Well Ranch High Clearance, 4-Wheel Drive Only']
description: ['The border roads remain closed (the dirt roads directly along the border and all crossover roads leading from South Puerto Blanco Drive to the border) to all public vehicle and pedestrian traffic for public safety. South Puerto Blanco Drive remains open.', 'El Camino De Dos Republicas remains open from SR85 to Gachado Line Camp. Dos Lomitas is not accessible. The southeast border road from Lukeville Port of Entry eastward to the Santa Rosa Mountains is closed to public vehicle and pedestrian traffic.', 'High Clearance, 4-wheel drive is required from where Pozo Nuevo Road begins along South Puerto Blanch Drive to Bates Well Ranch area. The road is washed out in areas. Bates Well Ranch is still accessible from the north on Darby Well Road.']

title: ['South Woolum Road Closed, Alternate Route Available', 'Parking is not permitted on the Kyles Landing Road (County Road 56)', 'Spring Creek Landing Closed to Vehicle-Assisted Launches']
description: ['In the interest of safety, the South Woolum Road has been closed. The Woolum launch and campground remain open.', 'Parking will no longer be permitted on the road to allow space for emergency vehicles to safely enter the park. There will be ‘No Parking’ signs placed along the Kyles Landing Road, also known as County Road 56.', 'The Spring Creek Landing has been closed to vehicle-assisted launches. Watercraft may still be put in and take out at this point, but must be hand carried to and from the parking area. This is to ensure the safety of visitors and avoid continued erosion.']

title: ['River Ferry at Akers (on State Highway K) CLOSED until further notice']
description: ['The Akers Ferry on State Highway K will not be in service until further notice.']

title: ['Cima Road between Cima and Interstate 15 CLOSED Until Late June 2024', 'Hart Mine Closed due to dangerous potential for collapse', 'Ivanpah Road Repairs - Traffic Subject to minor delays']
description: ['Cima Road between Kelso Cima Road in Cima and Interstate 15 along the north preserve boundary is CLOSED to all vehicles. Please do not drive around barricades, or cross this active construction zone in the Cima Dome area.', 'Hart Mine Road is missing several wooden culverts the burned in the 2023 York Fire. THe road may appear intact but could cave in under the weight of a vehicle. Stay off Hart Mine Road for your safety.', 'Mojave National Preserve Road Crews will be repairing a problematic low water crossing ~2 miles north of the Junction of Cedar Canyon Road. Minor Delays are expected.']
relatedRoadEvents: [[{'title': 'Cima Road Closed to ALL VEHICLES due to Construction', 'id': '734DA552-488D-4A3F-979D-751E95AB05CA', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/moja/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}], [{'title': 'Hart Mine Road', 'id': '09EAF34E-7380-4129-A04E-4F3AF013E1BD', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/moja/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}], [{'title': 'Ivanpah Low Water Crossing Repair', 'id': 'DEC80F3F-5E36-4E09-9DA3-1B74F93163D1', 'type': 'roadevent', 'url': 'https://www.nps.gov/moja/planyourvisit/conditions.htm'}]]

Park Full Name: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area
title: ['Old Mine Road South Closed for Rehabilitation Project']
description: ['Old Mine Road between Millbrook Village and Worthington State Forest will be closed for the 2024 summer season for a pavement rehabilitation project. Please see news releases for more information.']

title: ['Upcoming Closure', 'Road Open to: Mile 30 (Teklanika River)', 'Park Operations Altered Due to Pretty Rocks Landslide']
description: ['Beginning on May 6, through May 12 at the latest, the Park Road and all backcountry units west of the Teklanika River bridge (Mile 31) will be closed for bear collaring operations. The closure applies to all pedestrians, bicyclists, and backcountry users.', 'The Denali Park Road is currently open to Mile 30, Teklanika River. If wintry conditions occur, the road may close at some point closer to the park entrance.', 'Summer access to facilities and services in Denali remains altered due to the Pretty Rocks Landslide and the associated closure of the Park Road at Mile 43. Check here for more information on what to expect.']

title: ['Route 7 from Sawmill, AZ is NOT recommended']
description: ['Entering the park from the east at Sawmill, AZ on Route 7 is not recommended. Part of this route is UNPAVED and UNMAINTAINED. Please stay on paved roads, such as Indian Route 64 from Tsaile, AZ and Highway 191/Route 7 from Chinle, AZ.']

title: ['Gorge Road Closure for Paving']
description: ['Gorge Road, from the Gulpha Gorge Campground entrance to Sleepy Valley will be closed for paving starting Sun., April 28 at 8:00 p.m., weather permitting. This segment of the road will remain closed for at least a few days until paving operations finish.']

title: ['Walnut Canyon Desert Drive Closed Due to Flood Damage']
description: ['Recent flooding has caused major damage to the road. It is unknown when repairs will begin or the length of time to complete. The main park road to the visitor center and cavern is open. For updates on the road and trails, click "More" below.']

title: ['Vehicle Length Limits']
description: ["Vehicles longer than 24 feet are not permitted past the visitor center on Bonita Canyon Drive. Vehicles up to 29 feet are still allowed to stay in the campground, but can't go further. Parking for large vehicles and trailers is available at Faraway Ranch."]

title: ['South Cut trail Partially Closed']
description: ['South Cut Trail is closed between the main road and Killman Field trail due to washout along the trail. Detour for that section is along Killman Field trail. South Cut trail from Killman Field trail to the beach is open.']

title: ['NPS 300 Road Conditions', 'El Malpais Visitor Center closed May 13-15']
description: ['NPS 300 to Big Tubes is dry with\xa0some two-foot-deep ruts. A four-wheel-drive, high clearance vehicle is required.', "The El Malpais Visitor Center will be closed on Monday, May 13, through Wednesday, May 15, 2024, for seasonal staff training. The park's roads and hiking trails are all open to visit while the visitor center is closed. Thank you for your understanding."]

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.']

title: ['County Line Road Closed Monday To Friday']
description: ['County Line Road is closed during the week, from Monday through Friday. The closure will apply to all vehicular, pedestrian, and bicycle traffic. Please find an alternate route.']

title: ['Lassen National Park Highway is CLOSED for the season', 'Changing conditions']
description: ['Lassen National Park Highway connecting the north and south park entrances is CLOSED to vehicles. Vehicles can still access two park entrances. One at the northwest and the other at the southwest entrances throughout the snow season. Learn more.', 'Inclement weather may cause unexpected delays, closures and possibly hazardous road conditions. The visitor center phone line may be unavailable.']

title: ['Marconi Stairs/Beach Closed 4/30-5/23', 'Pilgrim Heights Parking Area and Access Closed 3/11-5/18']
description: ["The Marconi Beach stairs will be demo'ed and replaced between 4/30-5/23 and will reopen for Memorial Day weekend. For public safety and to allow the contractor to work unimpeded, the entrance road and parking area will be closed for the duration.", 'Between 3/11-5/18, the Pilgrim Heights parking area and access roadways in Truro will be temporarily closed to allow for repaving and survey work. 24-hour vehicle and pedestrian closures will be in place during this time.']

title: ['Potomac Heritage National Trail Closed at Glebe Road for construction activities']
description: ['The National Park Service is imposing a temporary closure of a portion of the Potomac Heritage National Trail crossing underneath Glebe Road Bridge during construction activities. This work is a subsect of the North Parkway rehabilitation.']

title: ['Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['You can help prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots. Before leaving your car to catch the ferry: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Warning about GPS Systems!']
description: ['Vehicle Navigation Systems and GPS units may provide inaccurate information—sending drivers the wrong way on one-way roads, leading them to dead ends in remote areas, or sending them on roads which are impassable. Use the Interstate exits for wayfinding.']

title: ['Watch Out for Tortoises on the Road']
description: ['Desert tortoises are active in the spring and will sometimes cross the road. Please drive cautiously and obey the speed limit. To learn more about this iconic species, why they are threatened today, and what to do if you see one, click the link below.']

title: ['Road repairs may occur 4/29 to 8/1; brief delays possible', 'Seasonal climbing closures in effect']
description: ["Crews will perform crack sealing and similar minor repairs on Arches' paved park road this summer. Visitors may encounter brief delays or reduced availability in some parking lots.", 'All climbers should ensure routes are not subject to wildlife seasonal closures. Many closures start March 1 or April 1 and continue through spring and summer.']

title: ['Secure trash and food']
description: ['Pack it in, pack it out! There are no trash services in or around the monument. All food & trash must be secured inside a vehicle or hard sided containers. Ravens routinely open zipped bags & tear into trash bags left outside or in the bed of a truck.']

Park Full Name: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument
title: ['Painted Hills- Large RV or Travel Trailer not Recommended Beyond Overlook Trail']
description: ['Don’t get your vehicle stuck at the Painted Hills! We want you and your RV or large bus to enjoy your trip. Travel trailers or large buses are not recommended beyond the Overlook Trail at Painted Hills due to limited turning radius.']

title: ['Portion of Calumet Trail Closed', 'Poor Trail Conditions on the Calumet Bike Trail']
description: ['The Calumet Trail from Mineral Springs Road to SR 49 is closed April 15th through the middle of June. There will be no public access through this stretch during this time. The closure is needed to modernize the trail by raising it and paving it.', 'The section of trail from the Dune Park Train Station to East State Park Road is in very poor condition with large, deep puddles of standing water and sections with larger gravel stones. Ride this section with extreme caution.']

title: ['Main Park Roads Open to Vehicular Traffic Starting March 10', 'County road through the Fort Heiman Unit is Closed to Vehicles Past the Pavilion']
description: ['Beginning Sunday, March 10th, 2024, main park roads will be open to vehicular traffic from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.', 'Fort Heiman is located at 682 Fort Heiman Road, New Concord KY. Due to poor conditions of county roads, the County has posted the loop road closed to vehicles past the park pavilion. Pedestrian access is permitted.']

title: ['Road repairs may occur 5/29 - 8/7; brief delays possible', 'Seasonal climbing closures in effect', 'Expect long lines to enter the park']
description: ["Crews will perform crack sealing and similar minor repairs on Canyonlands' paved park road this summer. Visitors may encounter brief delays or reduced availability in some parking lots.", 'All climbers should ensure routes are not subject to wildlife seasonal closures. Many closures start March 1, March 15, or April 1 and continue through spring and summer.', 'Between March and November, particularly on busy holiday weekends, you may experience long lines at the entrance road. Parking lots at popular trailheads and viewpoints will fill early. Pack your patience and arrive early to avoid crowds.']

title: ['Volcano Road Closure May 8 May 15 or 16', 'Volcano Road Closed to RVs and Buses over 26 feet, and to all Trailers.']
description: ['Volcano Road will have short closures for construction May 8 and May 15 or 16. The Visitor Center, Park Film, Museum, Boca and Lava Flow trails, and Bookstore will all be open.', 'The Volcano top road is not accessible to RVs, buses, attached trailers, or any other vehicle over 26 feet in length, due to the narrowness and weight limits of Volcano Road. Trailer drop off and RV/bus parking is available at the Visitor Center.']

title: ['Backcountry vehicle route closed for the season']
description: ['The full backcountry vehicle route remains closed for the winter season until May 15. Vehicle access is limited to the Cabin District.']

title: ['Park Closures', 'RV and Tractor Trailer Parking at the Visitor Center']
description: ['From time to time the missile range that surrounds the park performs military testing that may require the closure of the park or Highway 70. Please plan your visit around upcoming military tests.', 'There is limited space for parking for recreational vehicles and trailers in the parking lot directly in front (south) of the visitor center. RVs are asked to not park in the lot behind the visitor center. There is no parking space for tractor trailers.']

title: ['Bridge Replacement on Hopetown Rd. to Affect Access to Hopeton Earthworks']
description: ['Scheduled bridge replacement on Hopetown Road will impact visitor use at the Hopeton Earthworks parking lot. The parking lot will not be accessible to foot or vehicle traffic starting Sunday, May 5 thru at least May 11. Contact the park for more info.']

title: ["Staircase to Little Hunter's Beach closed until further notice", 'Jordan Pond Road closed due to bridge repair project', 'Historic Carriage Roads open to pedestrians only']
description: ["Due to damage and unsafe conditions caused by recent storms, a staircase and access route from the Park Loop Road to Little Hunter's Beach is closed until further notice. Park staff are working to address issues there over coming weeks.", 'Jordan Pond Road is closed to through traffic as part of a bridge repair project. Stanley Brook Road will remain open to provide access the Jordan Pond area.', "Acadia's historic carriage roads are now open only to pedestrians. They remain closed to all other uses, such has cycling and horses, to protect them during spring thaw, also known as “mud season.” Watch for further updates as conditions allow."]

title: ['Green River Ferry Status']
description: ['The Green River Ferry Status can change without advanced warning. For the most up-to-date ferry status information please call the Green River Ferry Hotline at (270) 758-2166 or follow the Mammoth Cave Roads and Ferry Twitter feed. 2 vehicle limit.']

title: ['Select Trails Require Day Use Pass from Woodstock Inn & Resort Nordic Center']
description: ['Four miles of trail along the carriage road corridors have been designated as ‘Multi-Use Trails’ in winter – walkers are permitted to use these trails free of charge. All other trails require a day/season pass from the Woodstock Inn. See link for details.']

title: ['State Route 148 closed for the winter season']
description: ['Visitors can access the park via Highway 143 and the town of Brian Head. You can view Cedar Breaks from the Northview Overlook. State Route 143 will remain open, weather permitting. On April 22, the seasonal snowmobile trail will close.']

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island closed to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island at Colonial National Historical Park will be closed fully to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18 to protect turtles during periods of increased activity and conduct a turtle activity study.']

title: ['Select Roads Open to Regular Vehicles', 'Vehicle Entrance Reservation Not Needed']
description: ['West Entrance to Old Faithful, Mammoth Hot Springs to Old Faithful, and Norris Junction to Canyon Village are open for the summer season. Additional park roads will open throughout May, weather permitting.', 'Although an entrance pass is required to enter Yellowstone National Park, vehicle reservations are not needed. You are encouraged to purchase an entrance pass before arriving, but you may also purchase passes at any entrance station upon arrival.']

title: ['US 50 Emergency Closure', 'U.S. Highway 50 Roadwork (On hold until Spring 2024)']
description: ['Colorado Department of Transportation has closed US 50 between County Road 26 and Elk Creek Road (18 to 20 miles west of Gunnison) from Mile Point 136 to Mile Point 140. Road closed expect delays due to road maintenance operations, no reopening date yet.', 'Road construction with delays and nightly closures on US Highway 50 between Cimarron and Pine Creek continues at least through Summer 2024. The road is open to two-way traffic on weekends and holidays. Cycling is not permitted through the project.']

title: ['Apostle Islands National Lakeshore Ice Caves Are Closed']
description: ['Due to unstable ice conditions, an ongoing closure remains in effect for ice caves within the boundaries of the park. This includes ice cave areas accessed from Meyers Beach Road. The last time stable ice allowed access to the ice caves was 2015.']

title: ['Rehabilitation of Colonial Parkway continues with additional Parkway closures', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island closed to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18']
description: ['Beginning Tuesday, April 9, 2024, construction will close the Colonial Parkway to all travel in either direction between Yorktown and VA Route 199. Follow all detour signs. See additional closure information in the link below.', 'The Island Loop Drive on Jamestown Island at Colonial National Historical Park will be closed fully to vehicular traffic beginning Monday, March 18 to protect turtles during periods of increased activity and conduct a turtle activity study.']

title: ['Passenger Ferry Dock Closed']
description: ['The ferry dock servicing the Cape Lookout Lighthouse area is closed for repairs. Visitors will have to use an alternative route on the beach to access the boardwalk. Visitors should wear sturdy, closed toe shoes because of potential hazards.']

title: ['CENTRAL VA – PARKING LOT CLOSURE– ROUTE 311/MCAFEE KNOB']
description: ['McAfee Knob/Route 311 parking area along the A.T. in Catawba will be closed Thursday, November 30. The lot is being closed to allow for the construction of a new pedestrian footbridge over Route 311.']

title: ['East Parking Lot Restoration']
description: ['Restoration of the parking lot East side of Route 345 (off Hopewell Rd) is anticipated to start this week.\xa0 No parking North of Hopewell Rd and slight trail & bridge diversions will be necessary during the project, anticipated to be completed Spring 2024.']

title: ['Drive Cautiously - Endangered Birds on Roadway']
description: ['Nēnē (Hawaiian geese) and ʻuaʻu (Hawaiian petrel) are nesting in the park and may land on or frequent park roads, parking lots, and road leading up to the park. Drivers are reminded to drive at the posted speed limits and exercise caution.']

title: ['Occasional lane closures and traffic delays due to construction at Hwy ZZ & Farm Rd 182']
description: ["Please be advised of potential delays or route obstructions to the Wilson's Creek National Battlefield Entrance from Hwy ZZ starting Monday, September 18th. Entering Wilson's Creek National Battlefield from Farm Road 182 via Battlefield may be faster."]

Park Full Name: Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site
title: ['GPS Navigation Systems']
description: ["GPS navigation systems often misdirect visitors driving to Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site. GPS systems often route visitors to our back gate, or to the entrance for Grant's Farm (not affiliated with the NPS). Please visit our directions page."]

title: ['Road Closure at Amistad Acres']
description: ['Due to soil and vegetation damage caused by off-road vehicle travel near Amistad Acres, undesignated dirt loop roads in the area are closed to vehicle traffic until further notice. The area will remain open to foot traffic.']

title: ['Santa Rosa/Highway 399 Parking Lot Closure']
description: ['The Santa Rosa Parking lots along Highway 399, numbers 32A and 33A and currently closed to the public for resurfacing and restriping.']

title: ['Sections of Sunken Forest Boardwalk Inaccessible During Repair Work']
description: ['During the month of April, a section of boardwalk near Sailors Haven marina will be inaccessible due to repair work. Visitors walking the trail should use the west end trail entrances and walk an out-and-back route, as loop walks will not be possible.']

title: ["What's Closed and What's Open? (Park Operational Updates) Monday, April 29, 2024"]
description: ['The Visitor Center is CLOSED between April 21 and May 4 for staff training. Visit the link for available visitor services/hours of operation. The North Rim of the park and SR 67 remain CLOSED to all vehicle traffic until May 15.']

title: ['Trail Closures on Battle Road Trail']
description: ['Battle Road Trail between Olive Stow Boardwalk to Shadyside Avenue and Lexington Road is closed until late Spring 2024. This will allow for the completion of a trail re-route. Entering closures is prohibited. Please plan accordingly.']

title: ['Slant Rock Road Closed to Vehicular Traffic']
description: ['Due to washout and bad road conditions Slant Rock Road has been closed to all traffic aside from hikers and bikers. To access Slant Rock, park your vehicle at the hunting inspection station off of Road 103.']

title: ['Arizona Off-Highway Vehicle (OHV) Requirements for Residents and Non-residents.', 'Looking for a Grand Canyon view? A warning about GPS navigation using mobile devices.']
description: ['Off-highway vehicles (OHVs) are required by law to display a valid OHV decal to operate on public and state trust lands in Arizona. This includes “street legal” vehicles that meet these two requirements.', 'GPS apps on mobile devices may direct visitors to "Grand Canyon-Parashant" who type "Grand Canyon" into their driving directions. Roads across Parashant require 4-wheel drive and all-terrain tires. There are no visitor services or cell reception here.']

title: ['Trail Conditions']
description: ['Trail conditions can vary throughout the state. Before heading out, check the trail conditions, potential re-routes and closures on the Ice Age Trail Alliance website.']

title: ['Cascade River Road Closed for the Winter Season', 'Be Aware of Break-ins along State Route 20']
description: ['Cascade River Road is closed for the winter season at milepost 20 (El Dorado parking lot), three miles before the trailhead.', 'Prevent smashed windows and theft. Break-ins are not uncommon at trailheads along State Route 20. Remove your valuables and electronics and take associated electronic cords.']

title: ['Phleger Estate Miramontes Trail Closed for Public Safety January 2022 Until Trail is Replaced', 'Smith Road Trailhead Parking Lot Temporary Partial Closure April 8 - June 30, 2024', 'Auto-Theft Warning - Only Bring What You Need to the Park']
description: ['Due to previous storm damage, the trail has been closed until the park can re-route it to a better location. Until construction of a re-route is complete, the trail will be closed.', 'Northwest portion of the parking lot off of Bunker Road in Marin Headlands will be temporarily closed. Stay out of the closure and park in the other parking spaces.', 'You can prevent vehicle break-ins in parking lots and scenic overlooks. Before leaving your car for even a short period of time: 1) Remove all valuables, 2) Lock your doors. 3) Take your cell phones and electronics with you. Read article for more details.']

title: ['Road Damage']
description: ['Due to damage from heavy rains, some roads may require high clearance or 4x4 vehicles for passage. Please use caution when approaching and driving on roadways. Trailers over 30 ft not advised.']

title: ['RVs, Trailers and Other Oversized Vehicles (Limited Parking)']
description: ['Due to increased visitation, parking lots often fill up early. Visitors need to be aware that parking for larger vehicles is very limited. RVs using "tow dollies" may have to unhook towed vehicles in order to turn around in the parking lot on busy days.']

title: ['Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Closure along George Washington Memorial Parkway', 'Some facilities closed along the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail']
description: ['There is a temporary closure of the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail crossing underneath Glebe Road Bridge due to construction along the George Washington Memorial Parkway. This work is a subsect of the North Parkway rehabilitation.', 'Please see our partner sites to find the most up-to-date information on closures, re-routes, or conditions along the Trail.']

title: ['Buxton Beach Access & Adjacent Beach Temporarily Closed']
description: ['The Buxton Beach Access, located at the end of Old Lighthouse Road in Buxton, and an adjacent three-tenths of a mile long stretch of beach, are temporarily closed due to petroleum contamination and remnant military infrastructure.']

Park Full Name: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park
title: ['Heavy Construction Vehicle Operations & Limited Amphitheater Accessibility']
description: ['Heavy construction vehicles are operating through the parking lot & Lower Overlook Park - use caution & be vigilant for hazards. Lower Overlook & Amphitheater access is via stairs only for construction duration.']

title: ['Landing at Hwy 137']
description: ['The highway 137 bridge landing sustained flood damage in 2019 and the landing restoration by NDOT has been completed. The area is smaller than in the past and the access to the water is steeper. Use caution when accessing the landing']

title: ['Seasonal closure of certain areas to prevent poaching']
description: ['The floodplain forest between the Connecticut River and NH Route 12A, north of the Blow-Me-Down Brook and forested areas on either side of Saint-Gaudens Road are closed to prevent damage from fiddlehead poaching during the months of April and May.']

title: ['Roosevelt Campobello International Park is located in Welshpool.']
description: ['Campobello Island is located in the province of New Brunswick, Canada. The physical address for the Visitor Centre is: 459 Route 774 Welshpool, New Brunswick, Canada E5E 1A4']

title: ['Spring Conditions']
description: ['Spring weather is variable at Mesa Verde. Snow and ice can delay opening the main park road. Trails often become muddy or closed due to rain or late snow melt. Current info is available at the Visitor and Resource Center. Click the link below for update']

Park Full Name: Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument
title: ['Swift Brook Road Gates Closed for Mud Season', 'North Entrance and Loop Roads Closed for the Winter Season']
description: ['As of March 4, 2024, the gates on Swift Brook Road that are managed by Prentiss & Carlisle have been closed and locked. These privately owned roads are closed to vehicle traffic every spring during "mud season" to prevent road damage.', 'As of November 3, 2023, the North Entrance Road and the Katahdin View Loop Road are closed to wheeled vehicles for the winter season. Access by foot and bicycle is permitted.']

title: ['Trail Ridge Road is Closed to Through Travel for the Winter Season']
description: ['Trail Ridge Road, which is Hwy 34 through RMNP, is closed to through travel for the winter. The road is closed at Many Parks Curve on the east side of the park and at the Colorado River Trailhead on the west side. For more information, call 970-586-1222.']

Park Full Name: Craters of the Moon National Monument and Preserve
title: ['Loop Road Closed to Foot and Wheeled Traffic Beyond Devils Orchard April 22 to April 29', 'Campground Closed for the Season', 'Navigation']
description: ['The Loop Road is open to vehicles as far as Devils Orchard. The Loop Road and all trails beyond Devils Orchard are closed to all foot and wheeled traffic while road maintenance takes place.', 'Lava Flow Campground closed to all for safety reasons while road maintenance takes place. Opening date pending road maintenance completion. Check back on Monday April 29.', 'Please do not rely upon GPS digital navigation systems to find your way to Craters of the Moon. Please note that the Visitor Center at 1266 Craters Loop Road is located just off U.S. Highway 20/26/93 and is not accessed via any unpaved roads.']

title: ["Montezuma Castle and Montezuma Well Closed To RV's/Trailers"]
description: ["Due to high levels of visitation expected and limited parking; from 10am-2pm parking for oversized vehicles will not be permitted. This means RV's, trailers, buses, or any vehicle that takes up more than one parking space. Drop off at flagpole is allowed."]

title: ['Going-to-the-Sun Road Seasonal Closure']
